activities:
RBG Holdings, Inc. is the sole owner of Royal Buying Group (Europe) GmbH.  Royal Buying Group (EUROPE) GmbH is the sole distributor of the Shell Prepaid Card in Germany.  We operate a web site which allows the purchase of consumer and corporate gifts.  Personal information received is used to process these transactions and data is retained for that express purpose.
